Typealiases.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK11VGSJSO.name: VGSJSONData
Typealiases.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK11VGSJSO.abstract: Key-value data type, usually used for response format.

Typealiases.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK14VGSHTT.name: VGSHTTPHeaders
Typealiases.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK14VGSHTT.abstract: Key-value data type, used in http request headers.

Structs/VGSLoggingConfiguration.html#/s:.name: isNetworkDebugEnabled
Structs/VGSLoggingConfiguration.html#/s:.abstract: Bool flag. Specify true to record VGSShowSDK network session with success/failed requests. Default is false.

Structs/VGSLoggingConfiguration.html#/s:.name: isExtensiveDebugEnabled
Structs/VGSLoggingConfiguration.html#/s:.abstract: Bool flag. Specify true to enable extensive debugging. Default is false.

Structs/VGSTextRange.html.name: VGSTextRange
Structs/VGSTextRange.html.abstract: An object representing text range with closed boundaries.

Protocols/VGSLabelDelegate.html#/c:@M@VG.name: labelTextDidChange(_:)
Protocols/VGSLabelDelegate.html#/c:@M@VG.abstract: Tells the delegate when text changes in the specified label.

Protocols/VGSLabelDelegate.html#/c:@M@VG.name: labelCopyTextDidFinish(_:format:)
Protocols/VGSLabelDelegate.html#/c:@M@VG.abstract: Tells the delegate when raw text is copied in the specified label.

Protocols/VGSLabelDelegate.html#/c:@M@VG.name: labelRevealDataDidFail(_:error:)
Protocols/VGSLabelDelegate.html#/c:@M@VG.abstract: Tells the delegate when reveal data operation was failed for the subscribed VGSLabel view.

Enums/VGSErrorType.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK1.name: unexpectedResponseDataFormat
Enums/VGSErrorType.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK1.abstract: When reponse data format is not supported.

Enums/VGSErrorType.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK1.name: responseIsInvalidJSON
Enums/VGSErrorType.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK1.abstract: When response cannot be decoded to json.

Enums/VGSErrorType.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK1.name: fieldNotFound
Enums/VGSErrorType.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK1.abstract: When field cannot be found in specified path.

Enums/VGSErrorType.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK1.name: invalidConfigurationURL
Enums/VGSErrorType.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK1.abstract: When VGS config URL is not valid.

Enums/VGSEnvironment.html#/s:10VGSShowSD.name: sandbox
Enums/VGSEnvironment.html#/s:10VGSShowSD.abstract: Should be used for development and testing purpose.

Global%20Variables.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK0.name: VGSShowSDKErrorDomain
Global%20Variables.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK0.abstract: An error domain string used to produce VGSError from VGSShowSDK - “vgsshow.sdk”.

Classes/VGSLabel.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK8VG.name: delegate
Classes/VGSLabel.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK8VG.abstract: The object that acts as the delegate of the VGSLabel.

Classes/VGSLabel.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK8VG.name: addTransformationRegex(_:template:)
Classes/VGSLabel.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK8VG.abstract: Add transformation regex to format raw revealed text.

Classes/VGSLabel.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK8VG.name: contentPath
Classes/VGSLabel.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK8VG.abstract: Name that will be associated with VGSLabel and used as a decoding contentPath on request response with revealed data from your organization vault.

Classes/VGSLabel.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK8VG.name: isEmpty
Classes/VGSLabel.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK8VG.abstract: A Boolean value indicating whether VGSLabel string is empty.

Classes/VGSLabel.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK8VG.name: isSecureText
Classes/VGSLabel.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK8VG.abstract: Bool flag. Apply secure mask if true. If secure range is not defined mask all text. Default is false.

Classes/VGSLabel.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK8VG.name: secureTextSymbol
Classes/VGSLabel.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK8VG.abstract: Text Symbol that will replace visible label text character when securing String. Should be one charcter only.

Classes/VGSLabel.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK8VG.name: clearText()
Classes/VGSLabel.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK8VG.abstract: Clear last revealed text and set it to nil. IMPORTANT! New request is required to populate label with revealed data.

Classes/VGSLabel.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK8VG.name: setSecureText(start:end:)
Classes/VGSLabel.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK8VG.abstract: Set text range to be replaced with VGSLabel.secureTextSymbol.

Classes/VGSLabel.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK8VG.name: setSecureText(ranges:)
Classes/VGSLabel.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK8VG.abstract: Set array of text ranges to be replaced with VGSLabel.secureTextSymbol.

Classes/VGSLabel.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK8VG.name: paddings
Classes/VGSLabel.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK8VG.abstract: UIEdgeInsets for text. IMPORTANT! Paddings should be non-negative.

Classes/VGSLabel.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK8VG.name: placeholderPaddings
Classes/VGSLabel.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK8VG.abstract: UIEdgeInsets for placeholder. Default is nil. If placeholder paddings not set, paddings property will be used to control placeholder insets. IMPORTANT! Paddings should be non-negative.

Classes/VGSShow.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK0A0C.name: subscribedLabels
Classes/VGSShow.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK0A0C.abstract: Returns an Array of VGSLabel objects subscribed to specific VGSShow instance.

Classes/VGSShow.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK0A0C.name: request(path:method:payload:completion:)
Classes/VGSShow.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK0A0C.abstract: Send request to reveal data on specific path. VGSShow instance will use all subsribed elements contentPaths to reveal data.

Classes/VGSShow.html.name: VGSShow
Classes/VGSShow.html.abstract: An object you use for revealing and displaying data in corresponding subscribed VGS Show SDK views.

Classes/VGSShowError.html.name: VGSShowError
Classes/VGSShowError.html.abstract: An error produced by VGSShowSDK. Works similar to default NSError in iOS.

Classes/VGSLabel.html.name: VGSLabel
Classes/VGSLabel.html.abstract: A view that displays revealed text data.

Classes/VGSLogger.html.name: VGSLogger
Classes/VGSLogger.html.abstract: VGSLogger encapsulates logging logic and debugging options for VGSShowSDK. Use .configuration property to setup these options. VGSLogger logging implies only printing logs to Xcode console. It doesn’t save logs to persistent store/local file, also it doesn’t send debugging logs to backend services.

Global%20Variables.html.name: Global Variables
Global%20Variables.html.abstract: The following global variables are available globally.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
